mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mortgage_loan_option ( dcls_month, fin_co_no, fin_prdt_cd, mrtg_type, mrtg_type_nm, rpay_type, rpay_type_nm, lend_rate_type, lend_rate_type_nm, lend_rate_min, lend_rate_max, lend_rate_avg, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{dclsMonth}, #{finCoNo}, #{finPrdtCd}, #{mrtgType}, #{mrtgTypeNm}, #{rpayType}, #{rpayTypeNm}, #{lendRateType}, #{lendRateTypeNm}, #{lendRateMin}, #{lendRateMax}, #{lendRateAvg}, NOW(), NOW() )
